title: Textile, 1851–63
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave; glazed
description: Two pieces with same ground, different floral pattern. A) Ground green in striped effect, broad band, narrower white and pale green, probably by "molette." Flower clusters in violet printed over ground. B) Same ground, smaller flower clusters in violet. Glazed.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1851–63.Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave; glazed. 1967-10-8-a.
